title: Looking for mid/support/adc roles for plat and diamond ranked team 2017
body:
Hi guys,
I am looking for a serious and fun ranked team game, we will communicate through discord throughout the games and work our way through higher ranked elo together. 

Add me if you are interested in joining, 
My summoner name is doublel1ft (number 1 not L)

Thanks

replies.body: i'm a plat support main. hmu if u need a support for this team
i have been told that my thresh is at an alright level so hit me up with a msg on league :)
and maybe  i can learn alot of new things since u diamond
